attributes.action: Give Parents with Troublesome, Unruly, Dirty Children Un- optional Parenting Lessons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some parents think its ok to just drag there kids up, some are just uneducated others are just Lazy. Whats the point in suspending kids, arresting them if their parents dont teach them whats right, These parents should be given lessons on how to control, clean. feed and bring up their children. These lessons should not be opptional and people who refuse should get fined.
